bibl.title: From Empire to Empire.
bibl.note: Introduction: Octavian's image and the conquest of Egypt. Audience and occasion. - Selected examples of the use of Ptolemaic iconography. - Conclusion. - Notes.
bibl.seg: WALKER Susan, From Empire to Empire.
Susan WALKER and Sally-Ann ASHTON (Edd.), Cleopatra Reassessed = The British Museum Occasional Paper. 103 (London, 2003) pp. 81-86, 7 figg.
Introduction: Octavian's image and the conquest of Egypt. Audience and occasion. - Selected examples of the use of Ptolemaic iconography. - Conclusion. - Notes.
